name: Donald Gill
text: This spot has wonderful service and tasty food. One of my favourite spots in town. The drinks and food served quickly and the prices were inexpensive. Highly recommended.

name: Dan Edson, Home Connection Team KC
text: Great service!  Fast in and out and you can't beat the price!

name: Jenny Benners
text: We only ever order from this location and they always have quick delivery, my order is always correct and the delivery guys are pleasant. One even caught my puppy for me after she got out of the yard! They have lots of good deals.

name: BelloYello Pink
text: Thank Goodness They Were Open!! Un Like The Belton Location.. 1st Time Here!

name: Ashley Cunningham
text: So I ordered two pizzas for delivery. Due to the current pandemic Pizza Hut put several protocols in place. So I felt comfortable getting delivery. Well when I got my pizzas they were slightly open so clearly they didn't put the protective â€¦More

name: PillowTalk
text: Itâ€™s just Something I wanna say is that they charged me double then took my partial payment as a tip even tho it was clearly stated multiple times it was a partial payment and the rest would be on my card. Never had an issue before this but something that was only $10.99 came out to be $25.99.

name: Alenia Dominick
text: Staff where very busy and friendly.   My pie was fast, hot and very good.

name: sydney
text: I have never left a bad review but thought my experience with them tonight warranted it. I ordered pizza around 8pm and got the notification that it was being delivered around 8:30. I waited by the window (I was starving lol) but there was â€¦More

name: Robert Kloiber
text: Rude Rude Rude. Too busy to help customers.   Never order from them again.

name: Kirsten Thiele
text: My husband and I tried to order two pizzaâ€™s online and the website wouldnâ€™t let us because it said that we had to order $10 or more when our order was already $25. We also were not able to choose any option besides delivery. Extremely disappointed!

name: Shelby Ronnberg
text: I Receive nothing but good service when I go to this location, i dont know what happened but my order wasnt there when I arrived once. They handled the situation very well and were nice enough to make it free of charge even though I would have gladly paid. Every time we go they are super nice, stuffblike this keeps me coming back!

name: Ashley Jamison
text: Iâ€™m a vegetarian and I ordered a tomatoes and cheese pizza and it was delicious. A must try. My family orders from this Pizza Hut at least 3 times a month.

name: Al Risden
text: This is a typical Pizza Hut restaurant. The service is great and the prices are very reasonable. There is a large menu selection and if your can't find what you're looking for, just ask the staff if it's an option. They are very well organized and seem to enjoy what they're doing and to me, reflects in the quality of food served.

name: Thunder Wolfenbarger
text: Great food and service and great prices

name: LB
text: STUFFED CRUST PKEASE!!ðŸ˜€

name: Kimberly Henderson
text: I have ordered carry out from this location a total of three times. I have been happy with the food, service, and cleanliness of the store each time. I normally order wings and a personal pan pizza. My food has been fresh and hot. The cashier that took my order was pleasant enough. I have no complaints.

name: Cyler Cobb
text: I used to love the last location great service and fast. Since they have moved customer service and speed has dramatically decreased. Will not be going to this location again.

name: Adrienne King
text: Not only did they not deliver my pizza but didnâ€™t even call to say they werenâ€™t delivering it. Very upset because I couldâ€™ve went somewhere else to eat waiting on them.  Now everything thing is closed and my kids and I are going to bed hungry! At least call and say something.

name: shawn pierce
text: They have messed up my pizza order once but we're quick to fix it when I said something and we're very quick about it. This place is worth it. Stuff crust, for days.

name: Courtney Carpenter
text: Black curly Hair in my pizza.

name: AMIRS WORLD
text: I like this pizza hut in Raymore. they always put more on my topping the way I like it. No unprofessional argument :)

name: Ryan Anderson
text: On time and no hiccups!

name: Rene Adams
text: Pizza hut went down hill for awhile but something changed, they moved up the street and now I love my pizza hut again!

name: Brenden Anderson
text:
Everyone acts like you called their baby ugly when you demand a refund. Pay for a service, you should expect a service.
"We'll give you a discount"...I never ordered a discount. â€¦More

name: Dawn Ruhl
text:
The young lady working the counter for take out was so sweet. Their food is typical Pizza Hut. Love their wings!
3 years later and now they don't answer the phone order was wrong, again. Didn't say anything here the past two times, but I am now.

name: Steve Van Curen
text: Won't be back for nothing, tried to rip us off 3 times!!! 3 strikes you're out  !!

name: Jim Banks
text: I have been ordering online and picking up a carry out order from this location for over five years. The pizzas have always been very tasty and ready when promised give or take five minutes.  I have no issues with the carry out service from â€¦More

name: Ashley Mitchell
text: Good customer service, food wasnt the greatest

name: Bert G
text: Delivered hot and delicious. Over the years I've become skeptical of pizza hut, but this store has changed my mind.

name: Rochelle Robinson
text: The pizza when comes usually tastes pretty good. However, the service is so slow.  It takes forever to get your order.  Because of this I would never eat at this location again.

name: Rodney Bishop
text: Order all the time great deals

name: greenanator5
text: It's okay food. Carry out is fine, but the delivery might take a long while over the estimated time.

name: lialia lia
text: It's only been one they have got my order correct

name: Adam Campbell
text: Ordered online and got my pizzas very cheap. The entire staff was nice and the new crusts/sauces were a big hit. The driveway access off 58 stinks

name: Jake Gibson
text: Awesome management here!

name: Mel Pergler
text: Pizza Hut has excellent food but sometimes they burn the cross this last time I got Pizza Hut they messed up my order and I waited an hour and a half to get my pizza when they only told me it would be a half hour because the store had told â€¦More

name: Barbara Capone
text:
Pizza Hut was ALWAYS my favorite.  But today after receiving two separate orders  IM DONE!!!
Both were made wrong ( missing ingredients) â€¦More

name: Milton Genge
text: Great service, product & priced

name: Earl Fann
text:
I work there.
The people are friendly.
The food is fresh and tasty.

name: Natalie Tatum
text: Pizza was hot and good.. The service was terrible. Never refilled drinks, took over 30 min for pizza to be done. I ordered online before I got there and was quoted 15 min. I had to go to the counter to request my check. Our waitress was on the phone laughing and talking. This was not the first time the fine in service was not good.

name: Lisa Owens
text: Staff was super friendly and pizza was excellent

name: Babar Bashir
text: Great

name: Ashley Keighley
text: Earl is our favorite delivery driver! He has the best customer service!

name: Jana Atkinson
text: The gluten free pizza is awesome.

name: Sarah Beers
text: DO NOT order pizza from here! I ordered a two pizzas from here, I received confirmation order number via email. Pizza was stated to be delivered at 715pm. We placed a call to the store and stated we were checking on a pizza we ordered and â€¦More

name: Ryan Grove
text: Good food, but poorly understaffed with inexperienced kids. I'm reminded every time we visit why we visit rarely. The service is not what you would expect even at fast food level, the orders have been filled wrong every time, etc. etc.

name: Zaire Hardin
text: Everything is usually good,  but this time the overcooked my pizza. It wasn't good at all!

name: Trissi L. Hardin
text: Nice & hot. Good deals.

name: Tim Thomas
text: Good service, good food.

name: Doug Galant
text: I have tried them 3 times..two deliveries and one dine in...horrible service dirty dinning room and deliveries never right and on time. â€¦More
